snippet: Former President George W. Bush will be back in the public eye as he promotes "41," his upcoming book about his father, former President George H.W. Bush....

headline.print_headline: TV Rollout Planned for Bush Book About His Father
headline.main: TV Rollout Planned for Bush Book About His Father

lead_paragraph: Former President George W. Bush will be back in the public eye as he promotes "41," his upcoming book about his father, former President George H.W. Bush.
